Submodules¶

nappo.learner module¶

class nappo.learner.Learner(scheme, target_steps, log_dir=None)¶

Bases: object

Task learner class.

Class to manage the training process. It pushes forward training calling the update workers and tracks progress.

Parameters

  • scheme (Scheme) – Training scheme class instance, handling coordination of workers.

  • target_steps (int) – Number of environment steps to reach to complete training.

  • log_dir (str) – Target directory for Tensorboard logs.

update_workers¶

The set of workers handling actor_critic updates.

Type

Worker or WorkerSet

target_steps¶

Number of environment steps to reach to complete training.

Type

int

log_dir¶

Target directory for Tensorboard logs.

Type

str

num_samples_collected¶

Number of train environment transition samples so far in the training process.

Type

int

metrics¶

Collection of deque’s, tracking recent training metrics (as moving averages).

Type

collections.defaultdict

start¶

Training start time.

Type

float

done()¶

Return True if training has finished (target_steps reached).

Returns

flag – True if training has reached the target number of steps.

Return type

bool

get_metrics()¶

Returns metrics averaged across number of updates.

print_info()¶

Print relevant information about the training process

save_model()¶

Save currently learned actor_critic version.

Returns

save_name – Path to saved file.

Return type

str

step()¶

Takes a logical synchronous optimization step.

update_algo_parameter(parameter_name, new_parameter_value)¶

If parameter_name is an attribute of the algorithm used for training, change its value to new_parameter_value value.

Parameters

  • parameter_name (str) – Worker.algo attribute name

  • new_parameter_value (int or float) – New value for parameter_name.

nappo.utils module¶

nappo.utils.cleanup_log_dir(log_dir)¶

Create log directory and remove old files.

Parameters

log_dir (str) – Path to log directory.
